metadata.dc:author: Lagomarsino, A J
metadata.dc:description: This paper updates some pharmacological, and toxicological skills a 40-year period of lithium use in psychiatry therapeutics allowed to be collected up. In spite of lithium's relatively recent popularity, an experience has been acquired which allows general principles of clinical utilization to be established. Rules for an adequate indication, and treatment monitoring, are suggested.
metadata.dc:title: La utilización clínica del litio.
[The clinical use of lithium].
metadata.dc:publisher: Acta psiquiatrica y psicologica de America latina
